tip: Using the `/alerts` command in <#728368180048822323> will display which continents are currently having a meltdown alert.
Playing for the full duration of an alert can reward you with up to 150 <:certs:802637527408050226> as well as 350 <:iso4:802637527151411240>.
Q-spotting will play a voiceline audible to enemies as well, therefore think twice about spotting whenever you want to remain stealthy.
Q-spotting enemies will display their real time positions as well as the direction they are looking at on the minimap, which is useful should line of sight be broken.
You can use `Ctrl + TAB` in game to quickly swap Yell/Squad chats.
By pressing `Alt + F` you can quickly check your fps on the bottom left.
Aiming down sights will be inaccurate should you be falling down as well as aiming during an uninterrupted spray. Therefore consider mixing in a brief firing pause.
Use `/enable_scaleform_fonts (1|0)` to enable/disable nicknames over people. This option can give extra fps and nicknames won't block your line of sight in large fights.
Your harasser got stuck? You can drop ammo pack under wheels to push it a bit
